videos.description: Blake Griffin grabs the steal and hands it off to Austin Rivers, who completes the play with a two-hand slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Rivers throws it down off a steal) 2017/11/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Rivers throws it down off a steal
